tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Qualified for the PGA TOUR China Series with a T35 at the second Qualifying Tournament in Haikou…Stayed in Haikou for the Series' debut tournament, the Mission Hills Haikou Open, where he T49…In his next start, finished T35 at the Buick Open in Guangzhou…Enjoyed a strong outing at the Earls Beijing Open in mid-June, easily establishing his best PGA TOUR China Series finish. Shot a final-round 66 at Earls Beijing GC to move up 18 positions into a T7…Following the summer break in the schedule, finished T32 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open, shooting four par-or-better rounds—including weekend rounds of 70-69 (5-under)…Was T45 in his next start, at the Chateau Junding Penglai Open…The following week, opened 72-68 at the Cadillac Championship on his way to a T24…Had a strong start to the Jianye Tianzhu Henan Open. Was at 6-under through 36 holes before an 8-over weekend dropped him into a T16, still his second-best PGA TOUR China Series' finish.

2013: Finished T34 at the Korean Tour's Dongbu Promi Open at Wellihilli CC…Missed the cut at the OneAsia Tour's China Masters.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T7th in 2014 at the Beijing Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 76th in Career Money Leaders on the PGA Tour China Series.
